headerText: The `v-divider` component is used to separate sections of lists.

usage.desc: Dividers in their simplest form display a horizontal line.

lightAndDark.desc: Dividers have light and dark theme variants.

inset.desc: Inset dividers are moved 72px to the right. This will cause them to line up with list items.

vertical.desc: Vertical dividers give you more tools for unique layouts and can be paired with the inset property for even more options.

subheaders.desc: Subheaders can be lined up with inset dividers by using the same prop.

dividerList.desc: Inset dividers and subheaders can help break up content

dividerListPortrait.desc: Create custom cards to fit any use-case

props.inset: Adds indentation (72px) for **normal** dividers, reduces max height for **vertical**.
